name: Time Out: A Soothing Machine Reflection
name_original: Time Out: A Soothing Machine Reflection
description:
Taking time to relax, reflect, and affirm yourself.

This game was made for the 2022 GameBling Jam, hosted by the TAG Research Centre at Concordia University and sponsored by the HERMES Research Team.
